#summary BlitzMax language binding of the Chipmunk Game Dynamics library.

= Introduction =

[http://wiki.slembcke.net/main/published/Chipmunk Chipmunk] is a fast cross-platform 2D Game Dynamics engine.

Version 1.02 adds a buoyancy demo, implementing one of the new body callback functions.

You can follow the module progress via the ChipmunkModuleChangeLog.

*NOTE* : To compile this module, you need to use a custom version of BMK. See [http://code.google.com/p/wxmax/wiki/WhatToDoWithBmk WhatToDoWithBmk] for more details.
